snippet.title: Chicken Assassin: Reloaded | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to rage! OneShark and Akupara Games are partnered up to release Chicken Assassin: Reloaded on Switch, Playstation 4, and Steam on July 17, 2018. Fight your way as Mean Mcallister, the baddest chicken in town, through multiple hordes of enemies to save your girlfriend in this hilarious, strategic button-mashing, action-RPG. 

To learn more about Chicken Assassin: Reloaded visit:  
►Chicken Assassin: www.chickenassassin.com
 
For more information on OneShark:
►Website: http://www.oneshark.com/
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/onesharkcom
►YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/onesharkcom
 
For more information on upcoming streams, game updates and more from Akupara Games:
►Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/akuparagames/
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/akuparagames
►Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/akuparagames/
►Discord: https://discord.gg/AkuparaGames
